summary: An ordinance vacating that part of the plat of the Grand Army Cemetery, lying north of a line one hundred eighteen feet (118) south of the south line of East Newton Street, produced east, over and across said Cemetery to the east boundary thereof, and all that part of 13th Avenue North, formerly known as Russell Street, commencing at a point in the south line of East Newton Street, produced east, five hundred nine and 67/100 feet (509.67) east of the west boundary of said Cemetery, thence south one hundred feet (100); thence east fifteen feet (15) to the place of beginning.
